directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add shell macaroni and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and rinse with cool water.
In a medium bowl, mix together the tuna, celery, green bell pepper, onion and creamy salad dressing.
Stuff the shell macaroni with the tuna mixture.
ingredients: 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained and flaked
2/3 cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
title: Poor Man's Shrimp
